analysis.description:
NBACrypto.teamsAreInitiated (/unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol#20-21) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- InitiateTeams (/unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol#119-153)

NBACrypto.ceoAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol#5-6)
NBACrypto.cfoAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol#6-8)
NBACrypto.teamsAreInitiated should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol#20-21)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_countryId' of NBACrypto.purchaseCountry (/unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol#42) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_teamId' of NBACrypto.modifyPriceCountry (/unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol#65-66) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newPrice' of NBACrypto.modifyPriceCountry (/unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol#66) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_teamId' of NBACrypto.getTeam (/unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol#74) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_teamId' of NBACrypto.getTeamPrice (/unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol#86-88) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_teamId' of NBACrypto.getTeamOwner (/unique_chucks/11/0x1a468849923b441a10b2673af9a74b5b71906087.sol#91-94) is not in mixedCase
